hero.title: Secure Your Dream Home A Premium 3 BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 49 Gurgaon
description: Sector 49 in Gurgaon is one of the most sought-after residential hubs offering an unbeatable blend of connectivity modern amenities and tranquil living. If you are searching for a spacious and well-designed home for your family finding the perfect 3 BHK flat here marks the end of your search.

Our curated selection of properties guarantees high quality construction prime locations and excellent resale value. These residences are ideal for young professionals or growing families needing extra space comfort and privacy. We understand that purchasing a home is a significant life decision which is why we offer comprehensive guidance from property viewing to final registration. Explore the best opportunities to own a luxury 3 BHK flat for sale in Sector 49 today and step into a lifestyle defined by convenience and sophistication.

featuresSection.heading: Exceptional Features and Amenities Defining Every 3 BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 49
description: Investing in Sector 49 means accessing a superior urban experience. Every property we list is carefully vetted to ensure it meets high standards of design structural integrity and amenity provision. We focus on flats that offer maximized natural light efficient space utilization and access to premium society facilities.

From dedicated parking bays to robust security systems and expansive green spaces these 3 BHK homes are built for long-term comfortable living. The apartments feature modern modular kitchens high-quality fixtures and fittings and spacious balconies providing panoramic views of the vibrant neighborhood. This is not just an apartment it is a lifestyle upgrade tailored for discerning buyers in Gurgaon.

features.description: Our 3 BHK flats feature state-of-the-art modular kitchens equipped with branded fittings ample storage and utility areas perfect for modern family cooking and entertaining guests.

features.description: Experience uninterrupted living with robust 100% power backup provisions for common areas and adequate backup for internal flat electrical points a necessity for Gurgaon living.

features.title: Vastu Compliant Layouts
features.description: Many of our available 3 BHK flat for sale in Sector 49 boast Vastu-compliant designs promoting positive energy flow harmony and prosperity for the homeowners.

locationsSection.title: Unbeatable Connectivity Sector 49’s Proximity to Key Gurgaon Destinations
description: Sector 49 boasts unparalleled locational advantages making it a strategic choice for property investment. It sits close to the major economic and entertainment hubs of Gurgaon ensuring that residents enjoy short commute times and easy access to all necessary infrastructure.

Whether you need proximity to the Golf Course Extension Road major hospitals top-tier international schools or expansive retail centers Sector 49 delivers. The area is seamlessly connected by major arterial roads and enjoys excellent public transport links further enhancing its appeal as a prime residential address. This location ensures high rental yields and strong appreciation for your 3 BHK flat investment.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a 3 BHK Flat in Sector 49
faqSection.description: Find answers to the most common queries potential buyers have regarding property investment amenities and legal aspects of purchasing a 3 BHK home in this thriving Gurgaon sector.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3 BHK flat for sale in Sector 49
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3 BHK flat in Sector 49 varies significantly based on the specific society the age of the construction the size of the super area and the level of amenities offered. Generally prices can start from INR 1.5 Crore and go upwards of INR 2.8 Crore for ultra-luxury or builder-floor options. We recommend contacting us directly for the most current and specific pricing details based on your preferred configuration.

faqs.question: Are the 3 BHK properties in Sector 49 ready to move or under construction
faqs.answer: Sector 49 is a well-established residential area meaning the majority of available 3 BHK flats are ready-to-move properties offering immediate possession. However certain premium complexes or builder floor projects might offer limited inventory under construction. We provide clear designation on all our listings allowing you to choose based on your immediate housing needs.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes for 3 BHK apartments in this locality
faqs.answer: The common super area sizes for 3 BHK apartments in Sector 49 typically range between 1400 square feet and 2100 square feet. This variation accounts for different society layouts balcony sizes and common area allocations. Larger sizes usually indicate more spacious living areas bigger bedrooms and additional utility balconies which are ideal for large families.

faqs.question: Is Sector 49 a good investment area for capital appreciation
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 49 is considered one of Gurgaon's most robust real estate micro-markets. Its excellent social infrastructure proximity to Sohna Road and the Golf Course Extension Road and continuous civic development ensure strong demand both for rental yields and capital appreciation. Investing in a 3 BHK flat here promises solid long-term returns.

faqs.question: What is the status of water and electricity supply in Sector 49 societies
faqs.answer: Sector 49 societies generally enjoy stable and reliable infrastructure. Most established complexes have dedicated backup generators ensuring 100% power supply during outages. Water supply is managed efficiently with reliable municipal connections supplemented by captive treatment plants minimizing dependency issues for residents.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and hospitals near the 3 BHK flats in Sector 49
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 49 boasts proximity to some of the best educational and healthcare institutions in Gurgaon. Reputed schools like DPS St Xaviers World School and popular hospitals like Artemis Hospital and Paras Hospitals are all within a 10 to 15-minute drive ensuring complete convenience for family needs.

faqs.question: Are builder floor 3 BHK options available in Sector 49
faqs.answer: Sector 49 is known for its high-quality builder floor options alongside traditional apartment complexes. These builder floors often offer larger floor plates more privacy and independent utility connections making them a popular choice for buyers looking for a bungalow-like feel with the convenience of a flat.

faqs.question: What maintenance charges can I expect for a 3 BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary widely depending on the society and the array of amenities provided such as a clubhouse swimming pool and extensive security. Typically maintenance fees range from INR 4500 to INR 7500 per month. We provide exact maintenance cost details for every specific property you are interested in.

faqs.question: How close is the nearest Metro station to Sector 49
faqs.answer: The nearest operational metro access points are the HUDA City Centre Metro Station and the Sector 55-56 Rapid Metro Station. Both stations are generally accessible within a 15 to 20-minute drive ensuring fast and convenient commuting options for residents working across Gurgaon and Delhi.

faqs.question: Can I get financing for a 3 BHK flat for sale in Sector 49 easily
faqs.answer: Yes all legally compliant and RERA-approved properties in Sector 49 are easily financeable. We maintain strong relationships with leading banks and NBFCs and can connect you with lenders who offer competitive interest rates and favorable loan terms for residential property purchases.
